name: gooey

effect.sun-moon: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

short_effect: Lowers attacking Pokémon's Speed by one stage on contact.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.

flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker’s Speed stat.
